item.description:
Feng Shui for Relationships
Saturday, Jan. 15, 2-4 p.m. $40 with Natalia Kaylin

Bring more joy and passion to your relationshipâ€¦or find a new one!
Learn how to design your home to create relationship harmony!
Workshop includes
●Detailed analysis of bedroom, bathroom and living room design to create harmony with Feng Shui priciples.
●Case studies, before & after images, handouts.
Bring a few photos of your bedroom, living room and bathroom so we can learn from real life examples.
Registration is required with Judy at judy@ahigherbalance.com or 781.639.1236.

Natalia Kaylin specializes in both classical and contemporary Feng Shui. Her services include residential and business consultations for existing spaces, remodeling and new site development. See her website at www.EasternSciences.com

For information on other upcoming programs please visit www.ahigherbalance.com
item.name: FENG SHUI FOR RELATIONSHIPS!
